Detailed Description

template<class V>
class PyVectorRef< V >

This class implements a PyVector that takes its value from a member of another Python object.

This is useful for exposing a Vector2, Vector3 or Vector4 member C++ class and allowing the underlying member to be modified when the Python Vector is modified.
